description: Commands to manage Planned Maintenance for Container Apps.

commands.name: az containerapp env maintenance-config add
commands.summary: Add Planned Maintenance to a Container App Environment.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env maintenance-config add --duration
                                           --environment
                                           --resource-group
                                           --start-hour-utc
                                           --weekday {Friday, Monday, Saturday, Sunday, Thursday, Tuesday, Wednesday}
examples:
az containerapp env maintenance-config add --environment myEnv -g MyResourceGroup \
    --duration 10 --start-hour-utc 11 --weekday Sunday

commands.name: az containerapp env maintenance-config list
commands.summary: List Planned Maintenance in a Container App Environment.
examples: az containerapp env maintenance-config list --environment myEnv -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az containerapp env maintenance-config remove
commands.summary: Remove Planned Maintenance in a Container App Environment.
examples: az containerapp env maintenance-config remove --environment myEnv -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az containerapp env maintenance-config update
commands.summary: Update Planned Maintenance in a Container App Environment.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env maintenance-config update --environment
                                              --resource-group
                                              [--duration]
                                              [--start-hour-utc]
                                              [--weekday {Friday, Monday, Saturday, Sunday, Thursday, Tuesday, Wednesday}]
examples:
az containerapp env maintenance-config update --environment myEnv -g MyResourceGroup \
    --duration 8 --start-hour-utc 12 --weekday Thursday
